review: Yep, Finally have it set up (My non-techie husband insisted, so it took some time to make himself do it - grrrr for me. But hey, I gave it to him for a gift so I had to let HIM do it.) For those of you non-techie people - don't dawdle! Just do it. It's super easy to set up. We LOVE IT! The VOICE SEARCH is the BEST! I was able to download Netflix, my local PBS programs, other much used Apps, and there are lots of cool documentaries options. I probably haven't figured out all the great benefits it has yet - but the Amazon Fire TV is totally worth it! OH, and I have the new Kindle - and yep - it is so easy to search around on my Kindle, then flip it up to watch it on the big TV. As easy as they say in the advertisements. I'm happy to answer any ones Q's on this one.
